verses.verse: O God <S%H430><s%>, you are my God <S%H410><s%>; early will I seek <S%H7836><s%> you <S%H5315><s%>: my soul thirsts <S%H6770><s%> for you <S%H1320><s%>, my flesh longs <S%H3642><s%> for you in a dry <S%H6723><s%> and thirsty <S%H5889><s%> land <S%H776><s%>, where no <S%H1097><s%> water is <S%H4325><s%>;
To see <S%H7200><s%> your power <S%H5797><s%> and your glory <S%H3519><s%>, so as I have seen <S%H2372><s%> you in the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>.
Because your lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than life <S%H2416><s%>, my lips <S%H8193><s%> shall praise you <S%H7623><s%>.
Thus will I bless <S%H1288><s%> you while I live <S%H2416><s%>: I will lift up <S%H5375><s%> my hands <S%H3709><s%> in your name <S%H8034><s%>.

My soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be satisfied <S%H7646><s%> as with marrow <S%H2459><s%> and fatness <S%H1880><s%>; and my mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall praise <S%H1984><s%> you with joyful <S%H7445><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%>:
When I remember <S%H2142><s%> you upon my bed <S%H3326><s%>, and meditate <S%H1897><s%> on you in the night watches <S%H821><s%>.
Because you have been my help <S%H5833><s%>, therefore in the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of your wings <S%H3671><s%> will I rejoice <S%H7442><s%>.
My soul <S%H5315><s%> follows hard <S%H1692><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you <S%H3225><s%>: your right hand upholds me <S%H8551><s%>.
But those that seek <S%H1245><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>, to destroy <S%H7722><s%> it <S%H935><s%>, shall go into the lower parts <S%H8482><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.
They shall fall <S%H5064><s%> by the sword <S%H3027><s%>: they shall be a portion <S%H4521><s%> for foxes <S%H7776><s%>.

But the king <S%H4428><s%> shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in God <S%H430><s%>; every one that swears <S%H7650><s%> by him shall glory <S%H1984><s%>: but the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of them that speak <S%H1696><s%> lies <S%H8267><s%> shall be stopped <S%H5534><s%>.
